thread.title: University Agreed to Settle Nassar Abuse Claims Without Knowing How It Would Pay

author: Douglas Belkin
title: University Agreed to Settle Nassar Abuse Claims Without Knowing How It Would Pay

organizations.name: university agreed to settle nassar abuse

text:
Michigan State University’s governing board signed off on the school’s landmark $500 million settlement in the Larry Nassar case earlier this week without knowing how the school would pay, board members said.
Interim President John Engler laid out the need to reach a settlement on a conference call Tuesday night with the Board on Regents, and the board agreed. “But we haven’t discussed how we’re going to do it,” said Joel Ferguson, a trustee.
...
